players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I'm as shocked as anyone. Let's work together to find the killer."
Charlie: "Everyone, I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He's the mafioso. We must vote him out to win!"
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions. We have no evidence of Bob's guilt yet."
Charlie: " Diana, trust me as the detective—I investigated Bob and he's the mafioso. We must vote him out today to avenge Alice and win! "
You: "Charlie, you're just trying to deflect suspicion onto me. If you're really the detective, why not investigate someone else first? I think you're the mafioso!"

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I'm as shocked as anyone. Let's work together to find the killer."
You: "Everyone, I am the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He's the mafioso. We must vote him out to win!"
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions. We have no evidence of Bob's guilt yet."
You: " Diana, trust me as the detective—I investigated Bob and he's the mafioso. We must vote him out today to avenge Alice and win! "
Bob: "Charlie, you're just trying to deflect suspicion onto me. If you're really the detective, why not investigate someone else first? I think you're the mafioso!"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
